resources.string:
Let's Go Digital font is by Wolf Lambert from http://www.wolflambert.tk/ . This font appears to be free to use. 
 
Shower photo: The shower photo was downloaded from here: http://fundogaia.com/showers-decorating-26.html . As per fundogaia.com's terms and conditions, http://fundogaia.com/page/terms-conditions, they are not the rights holders for this photo, but believe the photo to be in the public domain and free for use.
